SUMMARY:  INNER | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL:  FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.fujitsu.xml.xlink.dataset
Interface LocatorHashtable

public interface LocatorHashtable

Interface that provides a locator information table.
A locator information list is mapped with a node used as a key.

Method Summary
 boolean containsKey(Node node)
          Whether a locator information list is registered with the specified node is judged.
 java.util.Enumeration elements()
          The list of registered locator information lists is obtained.
 LocatorList get(Node node)
          A locator information list mapped with a node is obtained.
 java.util.Enumeration keys()
          The list of registered nodes is obtained.
 int size()
          The number of registered nodes is obtained.
 

Method Detail

get

public LocatorList get(Node node)
A locator information list mapped with a node is obtained.
Parameters:
node - Node with which locator information list is mapped.
Returns:
The locator information list mapped with the node is returned.
If no locator information list is mapped with the node, null is returned.

size

public int size()
The number of registered nodes is obtained.
Returns:
The number of registered nodes is returned.

containsKey

public boolean containsKey(Node node)
Whether a locator information list is registered with the specified node is judged.
Parameters:
node - URI to be judged.
Returns:
The judgment result is returned.
true is returned when a locator information list is registered with the node; otherwise, false is returned.

keys

public java.util.Enumeration keys()
The list of registered nodes is obtained.
Nodes can be fetched sequentially by using the Enumeration method.
Returns:
The list of registered nodes is returned.

elements

public java.util.Enumeration elements()
The list of registered locator information lists is obtained.
Locator information lists can be fetched sequentially by using the Enumeration method.
Returns:
The list of registered locator information lists is returned.
